channel.title: babel on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in babel on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Extending Babel
item.description: previous article Compounding Confoundment: arbitrary interpreters for Babel // Bodacious Blog Automate the process of changing the babel block wrapper (defun org-babel-raise () "Move the interior of a babel to the outside: remove the babel block chrome and keep only the source code." (interactive) (evil-with-single-undo ;; put a line after the block (call-interactively 'org-mark-element) (ekm "C-x C-x") (insert "\n") (ekm "<up>") (ekm "C-x C-x") (ekm "C-c '") (ekm "C-x h") (ekm "C-x h") (ekm "M-w") (ekm "C-c '") (call-interactively 'org-babel-mark-block) (ekm "<up>") (ekm "C-x C-x") (ekm "<down>") (ekm "C-y") (ekm "C-x C-x"))) (defun org-babel-change-block-type () (interactive) (if (org-in-src-block-p) (progn (call-interactively 'org-babel-raise) (call-interactively 'hydra-org-template/body)) (self-insert-command 1))) (define-key org-mode-map (kbd ">") 'org-babel-change-block-type) I have accidentally made this into the wrong type of babel (i.
